content: Suggestion: on the Resource References Graph view, for the MedicationStatement resources it would be much more useful to show the medication name rather than "MedicationStatement" (same display for each medication).pasted image
If you enter the name of the drug in the text, when you mouse over it in the viewer you should see the name...
problem with putting more text in the box is that of size. Could make it an option hough I guess...

a question - the query builder, there's no way to build a search like this:

GET medication?code:text=amoxycillin

?
set the resource to Medication, and enter 'code:text=...' in the query parameters...
